Service Details: - Recreation facility for recreation, fitness/wellness, learning new skills and training- Features an Olympic length 50 meter pool, wave pool, river run, 60m, 80m, and 90m long  water slides, Flowrider, children's water play area, fitness and exercise rooms, including a weight room and cardio area, and an aerobics studio- Adaptive equipment for disabled users
Hours: Mon-Fri: 5:30am - 9:30pm (pool opens at 6:00am) Sat: 6:00am - 8:00pm Sun: 8:00am - 8:00pm Stat. Holidays: 9:00am - 5:00pm
